content: this cozy crochet basket pattern is free and fun to whip up with the lovely feather stitch it s sturdy stylish and totally addicting to make this pattern includes a video stitch tutorial pattern is free with ads on my website > this pattern is part of the free advent > calendar mystery crochet along 2025 1 to > make last minute crochet gifts for > your loved ones or yourself this is > only 1 of the 24 patterns and 8 stitch tutorials in the > advent calendar mystery crochet along > but only 8 patterns will be made > available for free on nicki s homemade > crafts with ads > and the only way to get all 24 > patterns + 8 stitch tutorials with videos ad-free and printer-friendly > is in the **ebook** the **ebook** > will be on sale until december 24th > 2025 **the code 10gifts will save you $10 between december 1st and 24th > 2025 ** then the price will go back > up to the regular price so take > advantage if you want to get all the > patterns even ad-free and > printer-friendly >**get the ebook here 2 ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in out > membership the crochet club which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can get more info and join the membership here 3 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-last-minute-gifts-vol4/ ref=dec9pattern 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-last-minute-gifts-vol4/ ref=dec9pattern 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
